competitors.name: Google Analytics
competitors.notes: Comprehensive analytics tool for website and app performance, audience segmentation, conversion tracking

competitors.name: Mixpanel
competitors.notes: Founded 2009, product analytics with event tracking, user segmentation, and A/B testing - most direct competitor

competitors.name: Adobe Analytics (Omniture)
competitors.notes: Originally launched as Omniture in 1996, acquired by Adobe in 2009, feature-heavy enterprise solution

competitors.name: Kissmetrics
competitors.notes: Analytics platform focusing on user behavior tracking

context: Amplitude, Inc. is a digital analytics platform company focused on product analytics, experimentation, and customer data platform. Founded to help companies understand user behavior in digital products.
